languages.text: Вольный Торговец повелевает очистить Кьяву Гамма от следов ереси. Миссионеры и техноматы, техзорцисты и охотники на скверну устремятся на планету. Тяжек будет их труд и велика нужда в добром оружии, запчастях и жарко пылающем освященном прометии.

The Rogue Trader commands that Kiava Gamma be cleansed of every trace of heresy. Missionaries and technomats, Techsorcists and corruption hunters will make their way to the planet. Their gruelling task will entail a pressing urgency for good weapons, spare parts, and blessed, brightly burning promethium.
languages.original_text: Вольный Торговец повелевает очистить Кьяву Гамма от следов ереси. Миссионеры и техноматы, техзорцисты и охотники на скверну устремятся на планету. Тяжек будет их труд и велика нужда в добром оружии, запчастях и жарко пылающем освященном прометии.

Missionaries and technomats, techsorcists and corruption hunters will make their way to the planet. Their gruelling task will entail a great need for good weapons, spare parts, and blessed, brightly burning promethium.

Their gruelling task will entail a pressing urgency for good weapons, spare parts, and blessed, brightly burning promethium.

Their gruelling task will entail a pressing urgency for good weapons, spare parts, and blessed, brightly burning promethium.

The Rogue Trader commands that Kiava Gamma be cleansed of every trace of heresy. Missionaries and technomats, Techsorcists and corruption hunters will make their way to the planet. Their gruelling task will entail a pressing urgency for good weapons, spare parts, and blessed, brightly burning promethium.

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ordena que Kiava Gamma sea purificado de todo rastro de herejía. Misioneros, tecnómatas, tecnoexorcistas y cazadores de corrupción se dirigen al planeta. Su meticulosa tarea requiere urgentemente armamento, piezas de repuesto y el brillante fuego del prometio.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader commands that Kiava Gamma be cleansed of every trace of heresy. Missionaries and technomats, Techsorcists and corruption hunters will make their way to the planet. Their gruelling task will entail a pressing urgency for good weapons, spare parts, and blessed, brightly burning promethium.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ordena que Kiava Gamma sea purificado de todo rastro de herejía. Misioneros, tecnómatas, tecnoexorcistas y cazadores de corrupción se dirigen al planeta. Su meticulosa tarea requiere urgentemente armamento, piezas de repuesto y el brillante fuego del prometio.

languages.text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} ordonne que Kiava Gamma soit purgée de toute influence hérétique. Missionnaires, technomates, techsorcistes et chasseurs de corruption s'apprêtent à converger vers la planète. Leur tâche ô combien accablante nécessitera la fourniture urgente d'armes et de pièces détachées de bonne qualité, ainsi que du précieux prométhium brûlant de sa flamme sacrée.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader commands that Kiava Gamma be cleansed of every trace of heresy. Missionaries and technomats, Techsorcists and corruption hunters will make their way to the planet. Their gruelling task will entail a pressing urgency for good weapons, spare parts, and blessed, brightly burning promethium.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} ordonne que Kiava Gamma soit purgée de toute influence hérétique. Missionnaires, technomates, techsorcistes et chasseurs de corruption s'apprêtent à converger vers la planète. Leur tâche ô combien accablante nécessitera la fourniture urgente d'armes et de pièces détachées de bonne qualité, ainsi que du précieux prométhium brûlant de sa flamme sacrée.

languages.text: 行商浪人下令净化基亚瓦伽马星的一切异端踪迹，布道士、技工、技术巫师与异端猎人接踵而来。若要完成这项艰巨的任务，必须尽快为他们提供精良的武器、备用的零件，以及经过祝福、熊熊燃烧的钷素。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader commands that Kiava Gamma be cleansed of every trace of heresy. Missionaries and technomats, Techsorcists and corruption hunters will make their way to the planet. Their gruelling task will entail a pressing urgency for good weapons, spare parts, and blessed, brightly burning promethium.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人下令净化基亚瓦伽马星的一切异端踪迹，布道士、技工、技术巫师与异端猎人接踵而来。若要完成这项艰巨的任务，必须尽快为他们提供精良的武器、备用的零件，以及经过祝福、熊熊燃烧的钷素。

languages.text: ローグトレーダーはキアヴァ・ガンマから異端の痕跡を一掃するよう命じた。聖務団とテクノマット、テクソシストと腐敗の狩人たちがこの惑星に向かっている。彼らの過酷な任務には、良質な武器、スペアパーツ、そして祝福され、明るく燃えるプロメチウムが急務となるだろう。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader commands that Kiava Gamma be cleansed of every trace of heresy. Missionaries and technomats, Techsorcists and corruption hunters will make their way to the planet. Their gruelling task will entail a pressing urgency for good weapons, spare parts, and blessed, brightly burning promethium.

traits.locale_text: ローグトレーダーはキアヴァ・ガンマから異端の痕跡を一掃するよう命じた。聖務団とテクノマット、テクソシストと腐敗の狩人たちがこの惑星に向かっている。彼らの過酷な任務には、良質な武器、スペアパーツ、そして祝福され、明るく燃えるプロメチウムが急務となるだろう。

languages.text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} befiehlt, dass Kiava Gamma von sämtlicher Ketzerei gesäubert werden soll. Missionare und Technomaten, Techsorzisten und Korruptionsjäger werden auf den Planeten kommen. Für ihre grausame Aufgabe benötigen sie gute Waffen, Ersatzteile und gesegnetes, hell brennendes Promethium.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader commands that Kiava Gamma be cleansed of every trace of heresy. Missionaries and technomats, Techsorcists and corruption hunters will make their way to the planet. Their gruelling task will entail a pressing urgency for good weapons, spare parts, and blessed, brightly burning promethium.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} befiehlt, dass Kiava Gamma von sämtlicher Ketzerei gesäubert werden soll. Missionare und Technomaten, Techsorzisten und Korruptionsjäger werden auf den Planeten kommen. Für ihre grausame Aufgabe benötigen sie gute Waffen, Ersatzteile und gesegnetes, hell brennendes Promethium.

languages.text: Hür Tacir, Kiava Gama'nın kâfirlikten arındırılmasını istiyor. Bunun için misyonerler, teknomatlar, teknokovuçlar ve yozluk avcıları, gezegenin yolunu tutacak. Vazifelerinin meşakkatinden ötürü nitelikli silahlar, yedek parçalar ve kutsanmış, coşkuyla yanan prometyum gerekecek.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader commands that Kiava Gamma be cleansed of every trace of heresy. Missionaries and technomats, Techsorcists and corruption hunters will make their way to the planet. Their gruelling task will entail a pressing urgency for good weapons, spare parts, and blessed, brightly burning promethium.
